title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space
OB: When viewing the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, I observed that the text has excessive white space.
EB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should display the text without any unnecessary white space.
SR:
To fix this issue, the vertical alignment of the info label in the middle of the dialog should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING. To reproduce the issue: 
1) Load a project from the repository. 
2) Select a source folder. 
3) Open the Properties dialog. 
4) Select the Java Source Attachment section. 
5) Observe the info label that appears in the middle of the dialog.
